name: SparkAR: Design on a Face Reference
description:
SparkAR, an AR development program by Facebook, has enabled thousands of people to create face filters on Facebook and Instagram. This is a Figma file to enable people who are not proficient in design tools to accurately place their designs on a face reference provided by SparkAR here.


This file is created by Sarah Tan for her Skillshare class, AR for Artist: Create Your Own Face Filter (linking here after it is published), to allow non-designers to produce an asset to place into their face filter (with instructions too!).


Any feedback, please send them my way:

www.sarahtan.design
